mapper.insert: insert into STAGE_MY_XSHK_YEAR (PROJECT_NAME, PD_NAME, SUB_PD_NAME, DATA_DATE, RG_CNT, RG_AREA, RG_AMT, QY_AMT, QY_CNT_BUDGET, QY_AREA_BUDGET, QY_AMT_BUDGET, HK_AMT_BUDGET, HK_AMT, etl_time) values( #{projectName}, #{pdName}, #{subpdName}, #{dataDate}, #{rgCnt}, #{rgArea}, #{rgAmt}, #{qyAmt}, #{qyCntBudget}, #{qyAreaBudget}, #{qyAmtBudget}, #{hkAmtBudget}, #{hkAmt}, getdate() )

insert.foreach: insert into STAGE_MY_XSHK_YEAR (PROJECT_NAME, PD_NAME, SUB_PD_NAME, DATA_DATE, RG_CNT, RG_AREA, RG_AMT, QY_AMT, QY_CNT_BUDGET, QY_AREA_BUDGET, QY_AMT_BUDGET, HK_AMT_BUDGET, HK_AMT, etl_time) values ( #{item.projectName}, #{item.pdName}, #{item.subpdName}, #{item.dataDate}, #{item.rgCnt}, #{item.rgArea}, #{item.rgAmt}, #{item.qyAmt}, #{item.qyCntBudget}, #{item.qyAreaBudget}, #{item.qyAmtBudget}, #{item.hkAmtBudget}, #{item.hkAmt}, #{item.etlTime} )
